job_description:
Our client, a multi-billion dollar manufacturing firm, is looking for a Director of Payroll. Urgent and high profile hire!
• Director of Payroll
• Over 2,500 employees across the US and Canada
• Strategic role leading a team of 8-12 employees
• Management of team, subject matter expert, project implementation across brands
• Working with various unions and state regulations
• Travel once a quarter to other branches where your team sits
• 8+ years of experience requires with strong management and process improvement skills
• Workday, ADP or Kronos experience strongly preferred
• Excellent base plus bonus compensation package

Qualifications: 8+ years of experience requires with strong management and process improvement skills
Responsibilities: Management of team, subject matter expert, project implementation across brands
Travel once a quarter to other branches where your team sits
Benefits: Excellent base plus bonus compensation package
